address: Xã Thạnh Yên A, Huyện U Minh Thượng, Tỉnh Kiên Giang
thought:
**Analysis of Vietnamese Administrative Unit Changes**

Okay, so I'm tackling this Vietnamese address mapping task. I've got an old address: Xã Thạnh Yên A, Huyện U Minh Thượng, Tỉnh Kiên Giang. My goal is to figure out the new administrative units.  I'm focusing on the provided resolutions and new ward data to get the right answers.

First, I identified the old address components, which is straightforward.  Then I started with the Province resolutions (60-NQ/TW).  I quickly confirmed Kiên Giang wasn't on the "no-merger" list, so I moved on to the "merged" list. There it was: Kiên Giang is now part of An Giang (item 23). This immediately gives me the new province: Tỉnh An Giang.

Next up, resolution 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15. Since Kiên Giang merged into An Giang, this resolution is relevant. I focused my search within the resolution on the specific ward and district names. Line 47 is crucial. It directly addresses the merger of Xã Thạnh Yên A from U Minh Thượng into a new ward. And bingo! It states they are merged into Xã Vĩnh Hòa. The data matches perfectly.

Line 48 is a bit misleading at first glance, mentioning "U Minh Thượng" as the name of a *new* ward. However, considering the context of Line 47, it just makes sense that "U Minh Thượng" was the old district, which becomes a *new* ward in the new scheme.

To double-check, I matched the new ward name and code against the provided data: {"ward_code":"31012","ward_name":"Xã Vĩnh Hòa","province_name":"Tỉnh An Giang"}. This data corresponds with the changes described in the resolution.

While Line 48 mentions the name "U Minh Thượng", the main focus of this address mapping is based on Line 47, which explicitly mentions "Xã Thạnh Yên A".

Therefore, I'm confident in the mapping. The old province, Tỉnh Kiên Giang, is now Tỉnh An Giang.  And Xã Thạnh Yên A, part of Huyện U Minh Thượng, is now Xã Vĩnh Hòa (ward code 31012). The key citation to support this conclusion is 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15, Line 47. The confidence level is high because there's a clear, direct mapping within the resolution itself.

citation.header: 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh An Giang
citation.line: 47. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Vĩnh Hòa (huyện U Minh Thượng), Thạnh Yên A, Hòa Chánh và Thạnh Yên thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Vĩnh Hòa.
